portrait_l.name: chief

sjis.player_nickname: にも召喚獣か よかったな！

portrait_l.ascii: Goood for you to have a Summon Beast, !

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: 魚釣りなんて、何がおもしろいのかしら おまけに偏屈なおじさんに まともな道具も用意できないヤツは
portrait_l.ascii: What's so fun about fishing? On top of that, you have to deal with some eccentric old man!

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: 釣りをする資格がないって 仕切られちゃうし ホント、何がおもしろいのかしら
portrait_l.ascii: He said that I don't have the qualifications to fish Really, what's so fun about that.
